item.title: 美国新屋销售量在九月增长后基本持平
item.description: 美国10月新房销售量基本持平，此前9月曾出现增长，当时开发商通过降价和优惠措施吸引了焦虑的购房者。【原文：Sales of new homes in the US were little changed in October after advancing a month earlier as builders lured anxious customers with price cuts and incentives.】

item.title: 鲁比尼认为人工智能热潮将抵消从特朗普到地缘政治的风险
item.description: 连努里尔·鲁比尼最近也开始唱多。【原文：Even Nouriel Roubini is sounding bullish these days.】

item.title: 标普500指数在优于预期的美国通胀数据公布后震荡波动
item.description: 周二美国股市震荡，交易员们正审视最新的通胀数据和新发布的财报。【原文：US stocks fluctuate on Tuesday as traders examine the latest inflation data and fresh earnings reports.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔因问题钢铁厂遭索赔70亿欧元
item.description: 意大利最大钢铁厂的国家任命管理人起诉前所有者安赛乐米塔尔公司，要求其为该陷入困境的工厂的所谓"管理不善"赔偿70亿欧元（约合82亿美元）。【原文：The state-appointed administrators of Italy’s largest steelworks sued former owner ArcelorMittal SA, seeking €7 billion ($8.2 billion) for alleged “mismanagement” of the beleaguered plant.】

item.title: Meta计划将雷朋眼镜产量翻倍以应对需求激增
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Meta Platforms Inc.与依视路陆逊梯卡公司正商讨在今年年底前将人工智能智能眼镜的产能翻倍，以满足日益增长的需求并遏制竞争对手。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. and EssilorLuxottica SA are discussing potentially doubling production capacity for AI-powered smart glasses by the end of this year, in a bid to capture growing demand and head off rivals, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以下是美国12月CPI报告的关键要点
item.description: 以下是周二发布的美国12月消费者价格指数报告的主要要点：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from the US consumer price index report for December, released Tuesday:】

item.title: 印度央行行长马尔霍特拉称印度利率处于中性区间
item.description: 印度央行行长桑杰·马尔霍特拉周二表示，印度目前处于中性利率环境，央行将在评估经济增长和通胀趋势后决定下一步行动。【原文：India is in a neutral interest-rate environment now and the central bank will decide its next move after assessing growth and inflation trends, Governor Sanjay Malhotra said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果推出月费13美元的创意应用订阅套餐
item.description: 苹果公司宣布推出名为"创作者工作室"的创意应用订阅组合包，旨在面对日益激烈的竞争时，为其照片和视频编辑软件注入新的活力。【原文：Apple Inc. announced a new subscription bundle of creative apps called Creator Studio, an attempt to give its photo- and video-editing software fresh momentum in the face of intensifying competition.】

item.title: 爱尔兰推出电力计划以吸引数据中心投资
item.description: 爱尔兰正努力在国内能源限制与持续吸引国际投资的需求之间寻求平衡，希望为数据中心和制药厂等大型能源用户提供更便捷的电力获取渠道。【原文：Ireland wants to make it easier for large energy users such as data centers and pharmaceutical plants to access electricity as it tries to balance domestic energy constraints with the need to continue to attract international investment.】

item.title: 世界银行上调2026年经济展望，称经济展现"显著"韧性
item.description: 世界银行上调了今年经济增长预期，称在全球贸易紧张局势"历史性"升级的背景下，世界经济展现出令人惊讶的抗冲击能力。【原文：The World Bank raised its forecast for growth this year, saying the global economy has proved surprisingly shock-proof in the face of an “historic” escalation in trade tensions.】

item.title: 中国拟在卡尼访华期间放宽电动汽车限制以缓解油菜籽供应压力
item.description: 中国将在加拿大总理马克·卡尼访华期间提议放宽对加拿大油菜籽产品的部分限制，前提是加拿大政府降低对中国制造电动汽车的关税。【原文：China will propose easing some restrictions on Canadian rapeseed products during a visit to the country by Prime Minister Mark Carney, provided his government relaxes tariffs on Chinese-made electric vehicles.】

item.title: 赞比亚克瓦查结束因企业美元需求而创下的全球升值纪录
item.description: 赞比亚克瓦查对美元汇率时隔18个交易日首次走弱，终结了此前对美元汇率实现两位数涨幅的全球最强劲涨势。【原文：Zambia’s kwacha weakened against the dollar for the first time in 18 sessions, ending a world-beating rally that had delivered double-digit gains against the US currency.】

item.title: 牛肉在美国膳食指南中占据重要地位，价格却创历史新高
item.description: 12月消费者牛肉价格再创新高，恰逢美国新版膳食指南即将出台，有望提振对这种蛋白质的需求。【原文：Consumer beef prices reached a fresh record in December, just as the US’s new dietary guidelines are set to boost demand for the protein.】

item.title: 微软承诺支付公用事业费率以覆盖数据中心成本
item.description: 微软公司承诺支付足以覆盖其在美国运营数据中心用电成本的公用事业费率。这一承诺正值人们担忧消费者将被迫为电力支付更多费用之际——随着科技行业争相建设人工智能基础设施，电力需求激增。【原文：Microsoft Corp. vowed to pay utility rates that will cover the company’s electricity costs to operate data centers in the US, a pledge that coincides with concerns that consumers will be forced to pay more for power as the tech industry rushes to build infrastructure for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 汉莎航空今年将与Starlink合作提供互联网接入服务
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司将为800多架飞机配备SpaceX的星链服务，该集团正试图在日益激烈的市场竞争中提升其高端吸引力。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG will equip more than 800 planes with SpaceX’s Starlink service as the group tries to bolster its premium appeal in an increasingly competitive market.】

item.title: 特朗普将在达沃斯全球精英中抢占风头
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普将于下周三在世界经济论坛发表演讲，此次亮相很可能成为达沃斯全球精英年度聚会的焦点。【原文：Donald Trump will address the World Economic Forum next Wednesday, an appearance likely to dominate the annual gathering of the global elite in Davos.】

item.title: 美国国债价格跳涨，因通胀放缓支撑市场押注美联储六月降息
item.description: 美国国债价格大幅上涨，因低于预期的消费者价格指数数据强化了美联储今年晚些时候降息的预期。【原文：Treasuries jumped after a weaker-than-expected consumer price gauge bolstered the case for the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates later this year.】

item.title: 德意志银行称欧洲防务股估值逼近峰值
item.description: 德意志银行分析师警告称，欧洲防务类股估值可能正逼近峰值。该行业今年已飙升逾20%，而德银分析师是少数唱衰该板块的声音之一。【原文：European defense stocks might be approaching a peak in their valuations, warn Deustche Bank AG analysts, who are among the few contrarian voices on a sector that has already surged more than 20% this year.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚在选举年临近之际加速出售美元债务
item.description: 哥伦比亚今年首次向全球债券市场融资，当局正争分夺秒满足该国资金需求，以应对即将到来的国会和总统选举。【原文：Colombia is tapping global bond markets for the first time this year, as authorities rush to cover the nation’s funding needs ahead of congressional and presidential elections.】

item.title: 美国核心CPI环比上涨0.2%，扭转了市场预期中的大幅反弹态势
item.description: 美国12月核心通胀涨幅低于预期，这表明物价增长放缓的迹象更为明确——此前因政府停摆造成的数据扭曲曾使前次报告结果复杂化。【原文：Underlying US inflation rose in December by less than expected, a more confident signal of cooling price growth after shutdown-related distortions complicated the previous report.】

item.title: 台湾针对一加公司首席执行官发出逮捕令，涉及其在中国雇佣员工事宜
item.description: 台湾检方对华硕旗下智能手机品牌一加的首席执行官签发逮捕令，此举标志着台湾地区正加大力度阻止中国科技企业招揽台湾人才。【原文：Prosecutors in Taiwan issued an arrest warrant for the chief executive officer of the Chinese smartphone company OnePlus, stepping up the island’s efforts to block China’s tech players from recruiting Taiwanese talent.】

item.title: 瑞士拟取消仅靠单一收入维持生计的已婚夫妇的税收优惠
item.description: 瑞士政府支持一项提案，拟取消仅有一方工作的已婚夫妇的税收优惠政策，这项影响深远的改革方案将于三月提交全民公投。【原文：The Swiss government is backing a proposal to abolish preferential tax treatment for married couples with only one earner, endorsing a far-reaching reform that will go before voters in March.】

item.title: 捷克央行认为核心通胀是保持谨慎的重要理由
item.description: 捷克央行表示，尽管今年整体通胀率可能低于目标水平，但衡量该国潜在价格压力的关键指标仍居高不下，需要采取紧缩的货币政策。【原文：A key gauge of underlying price pressures in the Czech Republic remains elevated and requires tight monetary policy, even as headline inflation may undershoot the target this year, according to the central bank.】

item.title: 华尔街抛售38亿美元黄金市场复杂押注组合
item.description: 与标普500指数中一个小众指数相关的交易激增，揭示了华尔街正在酝酿一项更深层次的押注：利率将走低的赌注。【原文：A flurry of trades tied to a niche S&P 500 index is revealing a deeper wager coursing through Wall Street: a bet that interest rates are headed lower.】

item.title: 美国银行集团以10亿美元收购经纪商BTIG，加速拓展交易业务
item.description: 美国银行集团（US Bancorp）将以10亿美元收购经纪公司BTIG，这家美国最大的地区性银行正寻求进一步拓展投资银行和交易业务。【原文：US Bancorp, the country’s largest regional bank, will acquire brokerage BTIG for $1 billion as it looks to push deeper into investment banking and trading.】

item.title: 极讯网络考虑收购康普旗下的Ruckus
item.description: 据知情人士透露，极讯网络公司正考虑从康普控股公司收购鲁卡斯网络公司。【原文：Extreme Networks Inc. is exploring an acquisition of Ruckus Networks from CommScope Holding Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.description:
至少12艘满载乌拉尔原油的油轮在阿曼海岸闲置，更多油轮停泊在中国附近海域

item.title: Meta开始裁员，从元宇宙转向人工智能设备
item.description: Meta Platforms公司正着手裁撤旗下Reality Labs部门逾1000个岗位，此举旨在将资源从虚拟现实和元宇宙产品转向人工智能可穿戴设备及手机功能领域。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is beginning to cut more than 1,000 jobs from the company’s Reality Labs division, part of a plan to redirect resources from virtual reality and metaverse products toward AI wearables and phone features.】

item.title: 香港最直言不讳的激进投资者戴维·韦伯去世，享年60岁
item.description: 香港最具影响力的激进投资者戴维·韦伯去世，享年60岁。他因调查企业不当行为引发监管机构调查，成为香港金融界名人。【原文：David Webb, Hong Kong’s most vocal activist investor whose investigations into corporate malfeasance triggered regulatory probes and made him a celebrity in the city’s financial industry, has died. He was 60.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气与电力对冲基金即将获利
item.description: 转向全天候交易或许能在利润衰退之际，为投资者提供再度获利的机会。【原文：A shift to round-the-clock trading could offer a chance to make money again just as profits ebb.】
